elements.description: Initialise Firebase Remote Config. Generates MSG_INITIALIZED or MSG_ERROR
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.initialize

elements.description: Sets a callback function for receiving events from the SDK. Call `firebase.set_callback(nil)` to remove callback
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.set_callback

parameters.doc: Callback function that is executed on any event in the SDK.
parameters.name: callback

elements.description: Fetches config data from the server. Generates MSG_FETCHED or MSG_ERROR
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.fetch

elements.description: Asynchronously activates the most recently fetched configs, so that the fetched key value pairs take effect. Generates MSG_ACTIVATED or MSG_ERROR
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.activate

elements.description: Asynchronously fetches and then activates the fetched configs. Generates MSG_FETCHED and MSG_ACTIVATED or MSG_ERROR
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.fetch_and_activate

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, converted to a bool.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.get_boolean

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, as a vector of raw byte-data.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.get_data

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, converted to a double.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.get_number

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Returns the value associated with a key, converted to a string.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.get_string

parameters.doc: Key of the value to be retrieved
parameters.name: key

elements.description: Gets the set of all keys.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.get_keys

elements.description: Sets the default values.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.set_defaults

parameters.doc: Key-value pairs representing the default values. Generates MSG_DEFAULTS_SET or MSG_ERROR
parameters.name: defaults

elements.description: Sets the minimum fetch interval.
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.set_minimum_fetch_interval

parameters.doc: The minimum interval in milliseconds between successive fetch calls. Generates MSG_SETTINGS_UPDATED or MSG_ERROR
parameters.name: minimum_fetch_interval

elements.description: Sets the timeout that specifies how long the client should wait for a connection to the Firebase Remote Config servers
elements.name: firebase.remoteconfig.set_timeout

parameters.doc: The timeout interval in milliseconds. Generates MSG_SETTINGS_UPDATED or MSG_ERROR
parameters.name: minimum_fetch_interval

elements.description: Event generated when remote config has been initialized and is ready for use
elements.name: MSG_INITIALIZED

elements.description: Event generated when an error occurred.
elements.name: MSG_ERROR

elements.description: Event generated when the default values have been set
elements.name: MSG_DEFAULTS_SET

elements.description: Event generated when the remote config has been fetched
elements.name: MSG_FETCHED

elements.description: Event generated when the remote config has been activated
elements.name: MSG_ACTIVATED

elements.description: Event generated when remote config settings have been updated
elements.name: MSG_SETTINGS_UPDATED

elements.description: Functions and constants for interacting with Firebase Remote Config

info.description: Functions and constants for interacting with Firebase
info.name: extension-firebase-remoteconfig
